title: Introspect
summary: iOS application integrating Presage computer vision SDK to process 20+ microexpressions per second in real-time, providing adaptive social cue guidance for neurodivergent users via multi-API integration and live sensor monitoring.

bullet_points.text: Developed iOS application using Swift and SwiftUI that integrates Presage computer vision SDK to process \textbf{20+ microexpressions per second }in real-time, providing adaptive social cue guidance for neurodivergent users

Integrated multiple REST APIs (Gemini API for contextual analysis, ElevenLabs for text-to-speech with \textbf{\textless2s latency}) and implemented real-time sensor data processing for pulse and breathing rate monitoring
